statements: SELECT * FROM routes WHERE route_id = 1;
SELECT origin_location, destination_location, distance_miles FROM routes WHERE delivery_cost > 100;
SELECT route_id, estimated_time_hours, delivery_cost FROM routes WHERE origin_location = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance_miles, estimated_time_hours FROM routes WHERE distance_miles < 500;
SELECT * FROM routes ORDER BY delivery_cost DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_miles > 100 ORDER BY estimated_time_hours DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, delivery_cost FROM routes WHERE origin_location = 'New York' AND destination_location = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, estimated_time_hours FROM routes WHERE delivery_cost < 500 ORDER BY estimated_time_hours ASC;
SELECT AVG(distance_miles) AS average_distance, AVG(estimated_time_hours) AS average_time FROM routes;
SELECT COUNT(route_id) AS total_routes, SUM(delivery_cost) AS total_cost FROM routes WHERE origin_location LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_name, route_distance FROM routes WHERE route_distance > 100;
SELECT route_name, route_distance, average_delivery_time FROM routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, route_id_fk, day_of_week, departure_time FROM schedules WHERE route_id_fk = 5;
SELECT route_name, route_distance, average_delivery_time FROM routes WHERE route_distance > 100
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' ORDER BY day_of_week DESC
SELECT route_name, schedule_id FROM routes JOIN schedules ON routes.route_id = schedules.route_id_fk WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday'
SELECT COUNT(schedule_id) AS total_schedules FROM schedules WHERE day_of_week = 'Friday'
SELECT route_name, route_distance, average_delivery_time FROM routes WHERE route_distance < 50 ORDER BY route_distance ASC
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM Routes ORDER BY distance_km DESC;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM Routes WHERE origin_location = 'City A';
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance_km FROM Routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, delivery_time FROM Deliveries JOIN Routes ON Deliveries.route_id = Routes.route_id;
SELECT * FROM Routes WHERE distance_km > 100 ORDER BY origin_location DESC, destination_location ASC;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location, distance_km FROM Routes WHERE origin_location LIKE '%New York%' AND destination_location LIKE '%Chicago%' ORDER BY distance_km ASC;
SELECT delivery_id, route_id, delivery_time FROM Deliveries WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY delivery_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicles WHERE max_capacity_kg >= 500 ORDER by vehicle_type ASC, max_capacity_kg DESC;
SELECT route_id, COUNT(delivery_id) AS total_deliveries FROM Deliveries GROUP BY route_id HAVING COUNT(delivery_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_deliveries DESC;
SELECT * FROM Routes;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM Routes ORDER BY destination;
SELECT route_id, origin, destination FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name FROM Drivers ORDER BY driver_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Routes
SELECT origin, destination FROM Routes WHERE distance > 100
SELECT vehicle_type, capacity FROM Vehicles ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT item_name, item_quantity, delivery_location FROM Deliveries JOIN Vehicles ON Deliveries.vehicle_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id
SELECT driver_name, driver_license FROM Drivers WHERE driver_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc'
SELECT * FROM routes;
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT r.route_id, l.location_name, s.departure_time FROM routes r JOIN schedules s ON r.route_id = s.route_id JOIN locations l ON r.origin_location = l.location_id;
SELECT d.delivery_id, v.vehicle_type, d.delivery_date FROM deliveries d JOIN vehicles v ON d.vehicle_id = v.vehicle_id;
SELECT s.schedule_id, s.departure_time, s.arrival_time FROM schedules s WHERE s.arrival_time < NOW();
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE origin_location = 'b1198cc3-9ea7-4489-982b-ec3e00a808c0';
SELECT route_id, origin_location, destination_location FROM routes WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT vehicle_id, max_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_type = 'Truck' ORDER BY max_capacity DESC;
SELECT route_id, vehicle_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM schedules WHERE departure_time BETWEEN '2022-05-01' AND '2022-06-01';
